channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Son of ‘El Chapo’ pleads guilty in US drug trafficking case in deal with prosecutors
item.description: The son of notorious Mexican drug kingpin “El Chapo” has pleaded guilty to U.S. drug trafficking charges

item.title: Man pleads guilty to killing Ole Miss graduate who was prominent in LGBTQ community
item.description: A man charged with killing a University of Mississippi graduate who was prominent in the LGBTQ community has pleaded guilty to second-degree murder an...

item.title: New York advances casinos at a Bronx golf course and near Mets stadium
item.description: Casinos proposed for next to the New York Mets’ ballpark and at a golf course in the Bronx are poised to cash in on a lucrative state gambling license...

item.title: Babson College supports student deported to Honduras
item.description: Babson College has instructed faculty and staff to support a student deported to Honduras

item.title: Heavy snow predicted for Northeast as Midwest still struggles with Thanksgiving weather snarls
item.description: Black ice, snow showers and fog are pestering post-holiday travelers in the Midwest, while the Northeast is gearing up for its first major snowstorm o...
